selected_quotes: A large percentage of homicides occurring to women at work are perpetrated by intimate partners.
And mass shootings. And multiple homicides. And homicide suicides. And familicides. And homicides in general. Lots of…
here is a paper on the link between domestic violence and workplace homicide
Workplace #Homicides → US ♀ - Role of Intimate Partner Violence #IPV
From 2003 to 2008, 142 women were murdered in their workplace by their abuser, or 78% of women killed in workplace.

citation.abstract: Intimate partner violence (IPV) is an important public health issue with serious consequences for the workplace. Workplace homicides occurring to U.S. women over a 6-year period, including those perpetrated by an intimate partner, are described.
citation.title: Workplace Homicides Among U.S. Women: The Role of Intimate Partner Violence
